[PLACEHOLDER]: Multiple instances of "thing" and "stuff" used as unsubstantiated placeholders, disrupting clarity and flow.

[CLARITY]: Unresolved references (e.g., "the angel in blue," "Mother Maria de Agreda") lacking contextual integration.

[LEXICON]: Inconsistent/misused terms ("a stuff", "the thing") disrupting specificity.
[SYNTAX]: Awkward phrasing in sentences (e.g., "in furtherance of the schemes").
